sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_label/><action_name/><action_query>false</action_query><action_run_at>server</action_run_at><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><application/><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sc_req_item</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="sc_req_item">cat_item=624823d16fa08200d713c5cbbb3ee47c^u_subsidiary=15bb28de6f82a100de7ee1b3dd3ee4ef^EQ<item display_table="sc_cat_item" display_value="GSDC Order Entry" endquery="false" field="cat_item" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="624823d16fa08200d713c5cbbb3ee47c"/><item display_table="u_country" display_value="DE" endquery="false" field="u_subsidiary" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="15bb28de6f82a100de7ee1b3dd3ee4ef"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Order Entry value update</name><onclick/><order>250</order><priority>100</priority><read_access_action>false</read_access_action><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {

    // Add your code here
    var navisionValue = current.variables.u_orderentry_stage;
    gs.log('CheckB: ' + current.variables.u_orderentry_stage + ' : ' + current.number);
    if (navisionValue == 'Approval Required') {

        current.setValue('u_process_stage_sab', 'Pending approval with Finance/Treasury');

    } else if (navisionValue == 'Margin Approval required') {

        current.setValue('u_process_stage_sab', 'Pending approval with Sales');

    } else if (navisionValue == 'Approved') {

        current.setValue('u_process_stage_sab', 'Sales Order Reopened');

    } else if (navisionValue == 'Rejected') {

        current.setValue('u_process_stage_sab', 'Sales Order Reopened');

    }
	if (current.variables.u_order_number != '') {
        current.u_order_number = current.variables.u_order_number;
    }

    //current.u_order_number = current.variables.u_order_number;
    current.u_customer = current.variables.u_customer_name;
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin.singh</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-06-10 13:48:22</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>5707e7b11b59dc10ac0aea0e6e4bcb56</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Order Entry value update</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_5707e7b11b59dc10ac0aea0e6e4bcb56</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin.cs</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-06-23 13:53:31</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script></record_update>
